clinical_history: Patient with chest pain and shortness of breath.
findings: Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of left lower lobe.
Enlarged lymph nodes in left lower lobe, suggestive of lymphadenopathy.
Interstitial thickening and reticular pattern in left lower lobe.
Bronchiectatic changes in left lower lobe region.
recommendations: Consider CT or HRCT for detailed evaluation.
